sentences.en: Add the oats to thicken the mixture and stir until it is nice and creamy.
sentences.cn: 加上燕麦让混合料变稠，然后搅拌成奶油状。

sentences.en: By cereals we mean wheat, oats, rye, barley, and all that.
sentences.cn: 谈到谷物,我们指的是小麦 、 燕麦 、 黑麦 、 大麦之类的东西.

sentences.en: He feeds oats to his cattle.
Oats have been notorious for disease problems.
sentences.cn: 燕麦曾因病害问题而著称.

sentences.en: Oats is a crop grown mainly in cold climates.
sentences.cn: 燕麦主要是在气候凉爽地区种植的庄稼.

sentences.en: Oats provide good, nutritious food for horses.
sentences.cn: 燕麦是营养丰富的优质马饲料。
去年燕麦的收成不好((歉收)).

sentences.en: The best - known grains are wheat, barley, oats, rye and maize.
sentences.cn: 最为人们所熟知的粮食是小麦 、 大麦 、 燕麦 、 黑麦和玉米.

sentences.en: The farmers are working on the fields of oats.
sentences.cn: 农民们在燕麦田里干活.

sentences.en: The farmers here grow wheat, oats and clover.
sentences.cn: 这里的农民种植小麦 、 燕麦和秣草.

sentences.en: The kids need to sow a few wild oats.
sentences.cn: 这些小伙子需要放纵一下。

sentences.en: They don't know the difference between wheat, oats and barley.
sentences.cn: 他们分辨不了大麦 、 燕麦和小麦.

sentences.en: Wheat and oats are of the same family, but of different genera.
sentences.cn: 小麦和燕麦是同科的, 但不同属.

sentences.en: Wheat, maize and oats belong to the grain group.
sentences.cn: 小麦, 玉米及燕麦都属谷类.

trans.tran_en: the grain from which flour or oatmeal is made and that is used in cooking, or in food for animals
